job_history.work_description: Review federal and state laws to confirm and enforce company compliance for 9 offices. Maintain all I-9 records, address inquires from employees and management regarding new-hire activity and ongoing employee relation issues. Work with senior-level management to create fair and consistent HR policies and procedures. Create and manage more than 285 confidential personnel records. Run the semi-monthly payroll process. Process all salary changes stemming from merit increases, promotions, bonuses and pay adjustments. Successfully led key implementation for time and attendance, on-boarding and core payroll systems which led to reduction of overall cost and time. Lead yearly open enrollment training sessions with employees on benefit program updates. Work with outside vendors to enhance employee programs. Support 285 employees at all levels, including executive leadership. Conduct all new hire orientation and ensure all proper paperwork is complete. Create monthly and weekly headcount reports for executives. Arrange all travel itineraries for candidates and new hires. Manage and maintain all time and attendance records. HRIS administrator. Enter all payroll maintenance. Provide on-site training. Event coordinator. Ex-patriate liaison. Ceate yearly compensation spreadsheets for executive review. Communicate effectively with employees through email and Intranet announcements. Maintain company congratulatory gift programs and dinners.

Coordinated ticket times with executive chef; Managed multiple tables and guest interactions; Delivered 5-star quality dining experiences; Ensured guest satisfaction accross multiple parties Delegated critical tasks to expos and bussers; Maintained a professional attitude in high-pressure situations; Trained dozens of waiters and waitresses in essential serving skills; Averaged between 18%-25% tips based on sales

Coordinated ticket times with executive chef; Managed multiple tables and guest interactions; Delivered 5-star quality dining experiences; Ensured guest satisfaction accross multiple parties Delegated critical tasks to expos and bussers; Maintained a professional attitude in high-pressure situations; Trained dozens of waiters and waitresses in essential serving skills; Averaged between 18%-25% tips based on sales

Instructed two first year University French classes; Created and administered all assignments and exams; Recorded grades using Blackboard system; Led study groups to achieve maximum results; All students successfully completed the course with C or above; Recommended to instruct a two course prep my second year; Recommended to instruct a second level summer school course; Required to take three graduate courses in conjunction with instructing two courses; Held at least six office hours per week.

skills.name: HR Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in HR management, including creating and enforcing HR policies, managing personnel records, and leading key implementation for HR systems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll process, including processing salary changes and maintaining payroll records, suggesting strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led key implementation for HR systems, trained new hires, and managed a team, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated multiple tasks and responsibilities, including managing time and attendance records, payroll process, and employee relations, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with employees through email and Intranet announcements, and maintained a professional attitude in high-pressure situations, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Provided on-site training, trained dozens of waiters and waitresses, and led study groups, suggesting strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Coordinated travel itineraries and arranged events, including open enrollment training sessions and company dinners, indicating solid working proficiency in event planning.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Created monthly and weekly headcount reports for executives, suggesting some practical experience in data analysis.

skills.name: French Language
skills.explanation: Instructed French classes and created assignments and exams, indicating solid working proficiency in the French language.
